Press Conference with the International Executive Board
Press Conference with the International Executive Board

Press conference in which Michael Quill announces that the International Executive Board of Transport Workers Union recommends to Transport Workers Union Local 100 that it prevent, by any means, proposed layoffs being prepared by the Board of Transportation and the proposed new Transit Authority. The Union's demands included immediate collective bargaining, a wage increase of 25 cents per hour, and a contract that includes provisions making Transport Workers Union the sole collective bargaining agent for all employees of the Board of Transportation.
